h1: How Many Calories in Coors Banquet?

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Banquet beer contains 149 calories and 12 g carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Coors Banquet?

faqs.a: 1 g protein and 0 g fat per 12 oz serving.

faqs.a: Approximately 894 calories for six 12 oz servings.
